getting_started.js: Include the JS on your head page:

getting_started.install_bower_descr: You can also install Xblocks using Bower:
getting_started.install_npm_descr: You can also install Xblocks using npm:
getting_started.webpack_descr: For correct Assembly you should specify the location of the xtag and xblocks libraries in `modulesDirectories`.
examples.button_descr0: Buttons can be of the following types:
examples.button_descr1: For the button you can specify the icon:
examples.button_tag: To display buttons, use the tag <xb-button>.
examples.ico_descr2: The icon may not be available.
examples.ico_descr3: Specify size="m" to display a big icon.
examples.ico_descr4: Specify size="s" to display a small icon.
examples.ico_descr5: To display icons, use the tag <xb-ico>.
examples.checkbox_descr0: To display checkbox, use the tag <xb-checkbox>.
examples.input_descr0: To display input, use the tag <xb-input>.
examples.link_descr0: To display link, use the tag <xb-link>.
examples.menu_descr0: To display menu, use the tag <xb-menu>.
examples.menu_descr3: Show menu for the target object:
examples.popup_descr0: To display popup, use the tag <xb-popup>.
examples.radio_descr0: To display radio, use the tag <xb-radio>.
controls._attrs_autocomplete: Enables or disables the autocomplete. Possible values: on, off.
controls._attrs_autofocus: Sets focus to the form field.
controls._attrs_form: Associates a field with the form by its ID.
controls._attrs_for: The ID of the element to which to communicate.
controls._attrs_name: The name of the field, is designed to ensure that the form handler to identify it.
controls._attrs_readonly: Stipulates that the field cannot be modified by the user.
controls._attrs_xb-link: The inheritance of attributes <xb-link> using the prefix xb-link.
controls._attrs_xb-ico: The inheritance of attributes <xb-ico> using the prefix xb-ico.
controls._attrs_xb-ico-float: The location of the icons. Possible values: left, right.
controls.ico__descr_p1: The <xb-ico> allows you to create the UI element in the form of icons.
controls.ico__descr_p2: The icon set is pre-determined. Selection of a desired icon is performed by specifying the type attribute.
controls.ico__descr_p3: For most of the icons closing tag is not required, unlike the icons of type notification. The text inside the tag or the attribute value value are the message.
controls.ico__attrs_active: Allows you to use the icon as a control. When hovering over the icon will bring up the 'foot' and change the color.
controls.ico__attrs_disabled: The icon will turn grey and will no longer respond to mouse events.
controls.ico__attrs_size: The size of the icons. Possible values: s, m.
controls.ico__attrs_value: The contents of the icons. True for type notification.
controls.link__descr_p1: The <xb-link> is used to create links. Depending on the presence of attributes name or href <xb-link> sets the link or anchor.
controls.link__attrs_href: Specifies the address of the document to which you should go.
controls.link__attrs_name: Sets the name of the anchor within the document.
controls.link__attrs_target: The name of the window or frame where the browser will load the document.
controls.button__descr_p1: The <xb-button> is designed to create buttons.
controls.button__descr_p2: Depending on attribute type the button can be a link or switch.
controls.button__attrs_href: Specifies the address of the document to which you should go. For type link.
controls.button__attrs_multiple: Allows you to upload multiple files simultaneously. For type file.
controls.button__attrs_target: Name of window or frame, where the browser will load the document. For type link.
controls.checkbox__descr_p1: The <xb-checkbox> is used to create checkbox.
controls.radio__descr_p1: The <xb-radio> is used to create a switch.
controls.input__descr_p1: The <xb-input> is intended for creation of the input field.
controls.input__attrs_autosize: To Change the field size based on its content.
controls.input__attrs_ghost: Show field boundaries at the cursor.
controls.input__attrs_reset: Displays a button to reset the contents of the field.
controls.input__attrs_rows: Margin Height in lines of text.
controls.input__attrs_size: Size of the input field. Possible values: s, m, l, xl.
controls.popup__descr_p1: The <xb-popup> is designed to create window.
controls.popup__attrs_target-parent: Attach an item to the ancestor.
controls.menu__descr_p1: The <xb-menu> is designed to create menu.
controls.menu__attrs_target-parent: Attach an item to the ancestor.
extension.descr0: To create your own elements, it is sufficient to use the library xblocks-core.
extension.descr1: Using decorators and ES6 classes to define React component, any component can easily be turned into a web component.
extension.descr3: This will create a new web component xb-element.
extension.descr4: If you want the component to dynamically change its state when changing the attributes, be sure to include block propTypes describing types of attributes.
extension.descr5: Optional properties of a web component, you can specify the second attribute of the decorator.
extension.descr6: The format of the properties matches the description of the x-tag except for the lifecycle. Instead, it is proposed to use the events xb-created, xb-update and xb-destroy.
core.descr0: Library xblocks-core contains the basic methods for creating the web component and the view component.
core.descr1: Method create is designed to declare the web part.
core.descr2: The format of the properties matches the description of the x-tag except for the lifecycle.
core.core__events_created: Event registration component xblocks and insert an element in the DOM. Replace lifecycle.inserted.
core.core__events_update: Update Event of the item. It updates when you change the declared attributes or child elements.
core.core__events_destroy: Event removal of the element from the DOM. Replace lifecycle.removed.
core.core__props_mounted: React kind connected to the web component.
core.core__props_content: Getting or Ustinovka html content of the element. The analogy is innerHTML for the standard item.
core.core__props_props: Registered attributes with a type cast. The object contains the attributes of the element specified in propTypes in the Declaration.
core.descr3: To create a kinds of web component you must use the method view.register.
